name: Unfair or deceptive act or practice;penalties
text:
Unfair or deceptive act or practice; penalties.  (a)  Any person who violates any provision of this chapter shall be deemed to have engaged in an unfair or deceptive act or practice in the conduct of any trade or commerce within the meaning of section 480-2.
     (b)  The penalties provided in this section shall be cumulative to the remedies or penalties available under all other laws of this State. [L 2008, c 137, pt of §2; am L 2012, c 183, §2]
